Html:
When you've got pages of sources in the Reference List it will help to assign a keyboard shortcut to insert a citation at the cursor.
I've been looking and can't find a quick answer for Word 2010.

I can't find the Built-in Dialog Box Argument for the 'Insert Citation' dialogue box.

I have managed to add sources quickly by assigning a keyboard shortcut to this short macro:

Dialogs(wdDialogCreateSource).Show

You can also quickly bring up the Source Manager dialogue box with this:

Dialogs(wdDialogSourceManager).Show

Here in South Africa it's late at night and there must be an easy answer.

Can anyone help?

Thanks,

Lionel.
